events.description: When a visitor shares their cart
events.name: Cart Shared

rules.description: When a visitor shares their cart

cart_id.description: Contains the ID of the shopping cart that is being shared

share_message.description: Contains the message sent by the customer

share_via.description: Contains information on the method of sharing the cart

events.description: When a visitor views their cart
events.name: Cart Viewed

rules.description: When a visitor views their cart

cart_id.description: Contains the cart ID of the cart to which the product was added

events.description: When a visitor initiates the checkout process for their cart
events.name: Checkout Started

rules.description: When a visitor initiates the checkout process for their cart

affiliation.description: Contains the store or affiliation details from where the transaction was started

coupon.description: Contains details of the transaction coupon which can be redeemed with the transaction

currency.description: Contains the currency code associated with an order or transaction

discount.description: Contains the total discount associated with the transaction

order_id.description: Contains the order ID or transaction ID, whichever is applicable

products.description: Contains the list of products in the order or transaction

revenue.description: Contains the revenue associated with the transaction, excluding the shipping and tax details

shipping.description: Contains the shipping cost associated with the order or transaction

tax.description: Contains the total tax associated with the order or the transaction

value.description: Contains the details of the revenue with the discount and coupons factored in

events.name: Checkout Step Completed

rules.description: When a visitor completes a step in the checkout funnel

step.description: Contains the number associated with the checkout process step
